brief: Sets how often frames are read from the capture device. Setting the fps parameter to 4, for example, will cause 4 frames to be read per second.
name: frameRate()
description: Sets how often frames are read from the capture device. Setting the fps parameter to 4, for example, will cause 4 frames to be read per second.

parameters.name: ifps
parameters.description: speed of the capture device in frames per second
